casebody.data:
STATE.
v.
Reginal FULLARD. No. 455P14-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015.

Reginald Fullard, For Fullard, Reginald.

Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

Opinion *200The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th of July 2015 by Defendant to Appeal and Be Constitutionally Heard in Open Court Before a Sworn Jury:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
